text: @klcpegher This should have been mandatory weeks ago, in my area (Central Valley) people already had gatherings for:  St Patrick’s Day, Easter, Mothers Day, Memorial Day, Graduations, Birthdays - next is Fathers Day and then 4th of July.  Covid19 can easily come back
